name: Broken Mower [LD 47]
description:
This is a game made for Ludum Dare 47. The theme was "stuck in a loop", so I made a game about a robot mower stuck in a forward moving loop which have to be turned by the player.

Controls: Arrow keys

There is no grand goal in the game, just to get as many patches of grass cut as possible within the time until the battery runs out. The game starts immediately, but if I had a bit more time or skill I had added a delay or start screen.

I participated in the jam alone using Unity. All assets are done by me with Krita (art) and LMMS (sound).
